actions.name: Guard Dog

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an action with the [Social] Trait.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an action with the [Social] Trait.
Effect: The user gains +1 ATK stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Guard Dog
actions.description: Passive: The user cannot be Pushed, but will still be affected by damage and other effects of Push actions.
